/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ /* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ import React from 'react'; import { Card, Button } from '@../../../../reactify-ui/build'; import './card.scss'; import { borderedColoredCode, customClassCode, customSizeCode, disabledCode, simpleCode, noShadowCode, } from './code-refrence'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const CardDemo = () => (
Avenger's Endgame
Adrift in space with no food or water, Tony Stark sends a message to Pepper Potts as his oxygen supply starts to dwindle.

); export default CardDemo;
